1.name: Front door
1.desc: This house seems creepy. Looks like it was abandoned long time ago.
1.desc_examine: Everything made by old woods. The floor is squeaky when you step in. There's a hole in ceiling.
1.desc_move: It's too dark to see anything. The only thing you see is the creaky door in front of you.

2.name: Living room
2.desc_locked: Seems like the door is locked.

open_door.name: Open door
open_door.desc_locked: Door is locked! May need some key

unlock_door.name: Unlock door
unlock_door.desc: You use the key to unlock the door. Door unlocked!

find_key.name: Look at hole
find_key.desc: You can barely see, but not found anything. CRACK! Suddenly something dropped from above!

check_dropped.name: Find out what it is
check_dropped.desc: You searching around and found a key!
